messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. From Raj what is the shortest path to Kim? Starting from Raj, please list the scholar names in order, including Raj, separated by commas.

First, I will identify the connections Raj has, which are Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. 

Next, I will check each of these scholars' connections to see if any of them are directly connected to Kim. 

Jing is connected to Wim, Raj, Nisha, Wei, and Reza, but not Kim.
Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva, but not Kim.
Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing, but not Kim.
Wim is connected to Jing, but not Kim.

None of Raj's immediate connections lead to Kim, so I will need to look at the second degree connections. 

Jing's connections are Wim, Raj, Nisha, Wei, and Reza. Out of these, Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. None of these are connected to Kim.
Wei's connections are Reza, Wim, and Eva. None of these are connected to Kim.
Reza's connections are Wim, and Jing. None of these are connected to Kim.
Wim's connection is Jing, who we have already checked.

Since none of the second degree connections lead to Kim, I will need to check the third degree connections.
